data.description:
1. No login
If you do not want to log in, please select the Skip button to proceed.
You can watch the trial video.

2. Login/Logout
Enter the login ID and password you registered on the LPEGPOINT affiliated site and select Login.
Menus such as "Live/Trial Video/Favorites/Local Video/DL Center" are displayed.
When you log in with the ID that you used to purchase works or sign a monthly contract on the site, the works will be displayed in a list.
How to log out > Select logout from the settings button at the bottom left of the main menu.

3.Right menu
You can search for "Type/Sort/Manufacturer/Genre/Performer/VR Photo Book/Subtitle Function" in the menu on the right side of the player.

4.Settings
Clear Cache > If the playback does not play properly, please clear the cache.
Please check the Privacy Policy > Terms of Use here.
Update > You can check and update the current version.

5.Local video
You can switch between "All/Video/VR Photobook" in the top menu.
You can select and delete using the buttons at the bottom.
Local Videos > Download folder stores downloaded videos.

6.DL Center
You can switch between downloading and downloaded in the top menu.
You cannot play the video while it is being downloaded.

7. Menu while watching a video
Press the trigger while watching a video to display the operation menu.
You can adjust the volume/brightness with the slide bar on the left.
